name: Marisol Health - Catholic Charities of Denver
address: Multiple locations, including Denver and Fort Collins. (Specific addresses vary by service.)
description: Offers women's health care, counseling, and family support services, including gynecological, prenatal, delivery, and postpartum care. They do not provide abortions
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: MyCatholicDoctor
address: Primarily telehealth, with clinicians available in Colorado
description: Connects patients with Catholic healthcare professionals, many of whom offer telehealth services. They list various specialties and clinicians available in Colorado
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Centura Health (now part of CommonSpirit Health and AdventHealth)
address: Operates numerous hospitals and clinics across Colorado
description: Centura Health was a joint operating agreement between CommonSpirit Health (Catholic) and AdventHealth (Seventh-day Adventist). Following a split, CommonSpirit Health now manages 15 hospitals and affiliated clinics in Colorado, while AdventHealth manages 5 Adventist hospitals
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Porter Adventist Hospital (Part of CommonSpirit Health)
description: A non-profit community hospital offering comprehensive services including emergency, surgical care, orthopedics, and women's health
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Catholic Charities of Denver
address: Multiple locations, including the Mulroy Center in Denver
description: Provides a wide range of services, including senior support, healthcare referrals, counseling, and assistance with benefits like Medicare and Medicaid. They also operate Marisol Health
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Catholic Health Initiatives Colorado (Now part of CommonSpirit Health)
address: Various locations and affiliated clinicians across Colorado
description: Formerly a large Catholic healthcare system, CHI Colorado is now part of CommonSpirit Health. They offered a wide range of medical services and had numerous affiliated clinicians
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: SCL Health (Now part of Intermountain Health)
address: Operates facilities in Colorado, including St. Mary's Medical Center in Grand Junction
phone: Varies by facility. St. Mary's Medical Center: (970) 298-6363
description: SCL Health was a Catholic health system that is now part of Intermountain Health. Their Catholic entities retain their distinctive names and operate in accordance with Catholic health care directives
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: St. Mary's Medical Center (Part of Intermountain Health)
description: The largest medical center between Denver and Salt Lake City, serving western Colorado and eastern Utah. It is a faith-based, non-profit provider and part of SCL Health
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of Denver
address: Various locations, including Head Start program centers
description: Provides a broad range of services, including adoption, counseling, housing, and health-related services. They also operate Head Start programs
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation

name: Catholic Funeral & Cemetery Services Colorado
description: While not a direct healthcare provider, this organization offers services related to end-of-life care and planning, operating under Catholic principles. They offer discounts to Archdiocese of Denver employees
services: Catholic-owned Healthcare certification in Colorado consultation
